summary: Adds famous and great knives to Skyrim !
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys!
This is my very fist mod, hope you like it!

In the game, Lifelike Knives are craftable iron daggers with a very short reach but a good damage ration and a devastating critic stat.


Tel me if you want to see more of this here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49613/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D49613%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1313187&pUp=1

Steam version :
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=217477493&searchtext=



***[version]***
1.2
added - Laguiole Prestige
1.1
added - US 1918 trench knife
1.0
Carbone steal Opinel

***[installation]***
The usual "Data" folder... Nothing fency here, just unzip and copy/paste it in the Skyrim folder. When asked, merge files.

Edit: You should delete previous versions 1.0 (lifelike opinel) and 1.1 if you had it, since names and paths are different. It won't happen anymore this time. Sorry for the inconvinience.


***[blabla]***
Tell me if you want to see more of this. I'm also working on a dungeon mod which is totally not related to this though.

I'm also working on a dungeon mod which is totally not related to this though.

I used my own opinel for the texturing. It's old and kinda rusty so I figured it was a good fit for Skyrim.
author: MrVegaBiggs
